title: Volunteering - AFEV
description: Weekly support for young people experiencing academic and social difficulties, through individualized mentoring and collective educational activities. This volunteering develops interpersonal, listening, and teaching skills, while contributing to the fight against educational inequalities.

title: Civic Service - UNIS-CITÉ
description: Participation in a civic service program aimed at reducing the digital divide for seniors. Facilitation of collective workshops and personalized support to help users become independent in digital technology use. Development of skills in facilitation, pedagogy and social project organization.
skills: Digital Inclusion, Facilitation, Service spirit, Autonomy

title: Volunteering - Educational Games
description: Volunteer participation in a research project in kindergarten schools, aimed at evaluating children in mathematics through educational games. Design and testing of interactive mini-games promoting number recognition and mathematical logic. Collaboration with teachers and researchers.
skills: Python, Educational Games, Pedagogy, Interdisciplinary Work

title: IoT Internship - IUT Saint-Jérôme
description: Design of a complete IoT system for sensor data collection (brightness, electrical intensity, presence detection). Development of two Flask servers to visualize data in real-time and data transmission, integration with Grafana and MariaDB, automation of backups and alerts and project documentation on GitHub. Experience combining electronics, programming and system administration.
skills: IoT, Python (Flask), Raspberry Pi, MariaDB, Grafana, ESP32, STM32, Autonomy, Automation, Documentation
